template.name: Random Artists (Material Home Extras)
template.description: Artist based on selected criteria for the Material Home Extra menu

parameter.name: Material Home Extra name
parameter.placeholdervalue: Enter a name for your Material Home Extra menu definition

parameter.name: Use APC values for play count and date last played
Only include tracks with a skip count of less than
Only include albums with tracks from these years
Only include albums with tracks from these decades
parameter.data: select cast(((ifnull(tracks.year,0)/10)*10) as int) as decade, cast(((tracks.year/10)*10) as int)||'s', cast(((ifnull(tracks.year,0)/10)*10) as int) from tracks where tracks.audio = 1 and ifnull(tracks.year,0) > 0 group by decade order by decade asc

parameter.name: Limit to last added albums?
parameter.data: 604800=Added in the week before the last library import,1209600=Added in the 2 weeks before the last library import,2419200=Added in the 4 weeks before the last library import,7257600=Added in the 3 months before the last library import,14515200=Added in the 6 months before the last library import,29030399=Added in the 12 months before the last library import

parameter.name: Artist sort order
parameter.data: 1=Most played first (avg. count),2=Least played first (avg. count),3=Most played first (total count),4=Least played first (total count)

parameter.name: Limit to currently selected virtual library on player
Only include artist if
parameter.data: 1=the selected virtual library contains at least one track of the artist,2=all tracks of the artist are part of the selected virtual library
